mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College Cheerleaders. Standing (L-R); Tom Dolan, Todd Stiles, Tom Barrett, Greg Barber, Buddy DeGruy. Kneeling (L-R): Dawn Blalack, Susan Taylor, Diana Scanlon, Debbie Funk, Chris Collins, Kim Baird, Carolyn Partin.
